data.comment: The first-half is under way at Riverside - Barnsley kick-off to start the match.
Marcus Tavernier (Middlesbrough) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
In the minute 27, Sam Morsy for Middlesbrough has been booked by Oliver Langford and receives a first yellow card.
Oliver Langford blows to end the first-half.
Jonny Howson puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Middlesbrough with the kick-off.
Barnsley make their first substitution with Victor Adeboyejo replacing Dominik Frieser.
Goal! Middlesbrough extend their lead to 2-0 through Chuba Akpom.
In the minute 49, Callum Styles (Barnsley) has received a first yellow card.
Kilian Ludewig is replacing Marcel Ritzmaier for Barnsley at Riverside.
Jonny Howson is booked for the home team.
In the minute 61, At Riverside, Paddy McNair has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Gerhard Struber is making the team's third substitution at Riverside with Elliot Simoes replacing Luke Thomas.
Middlesbrough's George Saville has been booked in Middlesbrough.
In the minute 87, Hayden Coulson is replacing Chuba Akpom for the home team.
Penalty! Oliver Langford points to the spot, great chance for Barnsley...
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Cauley Woodrow's spot-kick reduces the deficit 2-1.
At Riverside, Marcus Bettinelli has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Elliot Simoes (Barnsley) gets a yellow card.
